name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Automation Engineer with extensive experience in **Python** and a deep understanding of **Automation Frameworks**. Skilled in developing and enhancing **CI/CD** pipelines, ensuring robust **API Security**, and implementing comprehensive **Testing Infrastructure**. Proficient in various testing methodologies including **Integration Testing**, **End-to-End Testing**, **Performance Testing**, **Security Testing**, and **Debugging**. Demonstrated ability in **Fuzzing**, **Vulnerability Detection**, and **Shift-Left Testing**, combined with expertise in **Behavioral Analysis** to drive quality and efficiency. Originally established as a Full-Stack Software Engineer, successfully designed scalable applications utilizing **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular**, delivering user-centric solutions in the healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented automation frameworks using **Python**, reducing testing time by **50%** through efficient script development and execution.
Designed and managed CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **AWS**, achieving a deployment success rate of **98%** on the first attempt.
Developed and executed comprehensive integration testing strategies to enhance API security, achieving a reduction in vulnerabilities by **60%**.
Conducted performance testing and debugging of application components, resulting in a **25%** improvement in response time.
Utilized security testing techniques, including fuzzing and vulnerability detection, to proactively identify and mitigate risks in application code.
Facilitated end-to-end testing processes, improving overall system reliability through rigorous behavioral analysis and shift-left testing strategies.
Automated testing environments and processes to streamline workflows, enhancing productivity across development teams.

• Implemented robust testing infrastructure and automated testing processes using **Python**, resulting in a streamlined workflow and reduced manual testing time by 40%.
• Enhanced API security measures, ensuring compliance with industry standards and achieving a **99%** vulnerability detection rate.
• Developed end-to-end testing suites for applications, utilizing **Automation Frameworks** that increased testing coverage by **30%**.
• Conducted performance testing utilizing tools that identified bottlenecks, improving application speed by **20%**.
• Integrated CI/CD pipeline using **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, reducing deployment times from hours to mere minutes.
• Executed shift-left testing strategies, ensuring earlier detection of bugs and issues, thus enhancing overall product quality.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement behavioral analysis processes, improving team efficiency by **15%**.
• Utilized debugging techniques to resolve critical application issues, maintaining a **99%** uptime.
• Normalized fuzzing and vulnerability detection techniques into workflows to enhance product security posture.

Utilized **Python** to develop automation frameworks that streamlined testing processes, achieving a 25% reduction in testing time.
Implemented CI/CD practices, enhancing deployment efficiency by up to **50%**.
Ensured API security through rigorous testing methods, improving security compliance by **35%**.
Led integration testing initiatives, identifying vulnerabilities with a **20%** increase in detection rates.
Conducted end-to-end testing, ensuring seamless functionality across the system with **95%** test coverage.
Executed performance testing strategies that improved application response times by **30%**.
Played a key role in debugging and fuzzing to identify security gaps, resulting in a **15%** decrease in reported vulnerabilities.
Developed infrastructure for comprehensive security testing, enhancing overall system resilience.
